headlines: Did the backup run successfully last night?
When does my TLS certificate expire again?
The site is down, is someone handling it?
Who's monitoring the backend during my vacation?
Is there a job running right now?
Haven't we had this issue before?
How fast is the frontend responding?
hero.description:
Whether you're a solo dev or a talented team,
we monitor your site and all your background tasks,
we alert the right person at the right time,
we put order in your incidents,
in short, we make your life easier

featureGroups.title: Uptime Monitoring
features: Configurable check interval, as often as every 15 seconds
Checks performed using a real Chrome-based browser
Assertions on the content of the page
HTTP Request customization (method, headers, timeout and more)

featureGroups.title: Task Monitoring
features: Track the status of ad-hoc tasks as well as scheduled tasks
Task run details: timings, logs, exit code and more
Notifications for late, absent or failed tasks
Customizable grace period for late tasks
Customizable heartbeat interval for running tasks
Notifications for tasks running longer than expected
CLI Tool to wrap any command and monitor its output

featureGroups.title: Incident Management
features: Incident acknowledgement by one or more team members
Suggested fixes based on similar incidents

featureGroups.title: Team Management
features: Invite people to join your team and collaborate on incidents
Create groups to send notifications to

featureGroups.title: Common platform features
features: REST API to create and edit monitors, tasks, status pages, team members, etc.
Command-line tool for Windows, macOS and Linux
Metadata system to organize, filter and search monitors, tasks, incidents, etc.

final.title: Ready to get started?
final.description: Start monitoring your uptime, tasks, and incidents for free.

uptime.title: Uptime monitoring that just works
uptime.description: Be the first to know when you website is down

checkInterval.title: 15 seconds check interval
checkInterval.description: Frequent checks mean we can detect issues in real-time and help you fix them quickly

realBrowser.title: Real browser
realBrowser.description: We use a real browser to check your website, with Javascript rendering and all

assertions.title: Flexible content assertions
assertions.description: You can define custom assertions to ensure your endpoints not only respond, but also serve the expected content

screenshots.title: Screenshots
screenshots.description: We take screenshots of your website on failure, so you can see exactly what your users experienced

httpDetails.title: Complete HTTP Response details
httpDetails.description: We capture the entire HTTP response, including headers, status code, and body

tasks.title: Task monitoring
tasks.description: Monitor the status of any process, one-shot or recurring, and get notified when a task is failing, running late, or just not running at all. No more missed database backups.

cronJobs.title: Keep track of any Cron job
cronJobs.description: Workflows, database backups, daily reports, etc.

lateNotification.title: Get notified when a task is running late
lateNotification.description: A job isn't starting on time? We'll let you know

integration.title: Easy integration
integration.description: Our agent can monitor any process. Just give it the command to run, and we'll take care of the rest

api.title: Simple API for developers
api.description: Need a custom integration? Our REST API can do anything you can do from the dashboard

history.title: Complete job history
history.description: You can see the previous runs of any job, and for each job, get the output, logs and timings and ease

incidents.title: Incidents
incidents.description: Collect insights on past and ongoing incidents, understand what went wrong and know who is taking care of it.

timeline.title: Get the complete incident timeline
timeline.description: Know when an incident was detected, when it was confirmed, who worked on it, and when it was resolved

collaboration.title: Collaborate on incidents
collaboration.description: Work together on incidents, with comments, status updates, and assignees

learning.title: Learn from past incidents
learning.description: When an incident occurs, we can find similar incidents in the past and suggest fixes from what worked before

organization.title: Organize the chaos
organization.description: With incident grouping and labels, you can organize incidents by cause, application, region, team, or anything you see fit

visualization.title: Visualize your uptime at a glance
visualization.description: With public and private status pages, get a quick overview of your incident history, grouped by any criteria you want

integration.title: Integrate incidents from other systems
integration.description: With manual incident creation from our dashboard, or with our easy-to-use API, put all your incident data in one place

alerts.title: Alerts
alerts.description: When things go wrong, we make sure the right people are alerted at exactly the right time. Working in teams? Fine-tune your alerting to your team's workflow.

unlimitedEmails.title: Unlimited e-mails and push notifications
unlimitedEmails.description: Alerts right in your pocket, no limit, no extra cost.

sms.title: SMS alerts and phone calls
sms.description: Know what's going on, even when offline

escalation.title: Flexible escalation policies
escalation.description: Make sure incidents are taken care of: define first responders, escalate stagnating incidents, mix alerting channels, and more.

webhooks.title: Push alerts to any system
webhooks.description: With easy-to-setup webhooks, receive alerts right in a messaging app, a terminal, on a billboard, or anything else you can think of

weeklyReports.title: Receive weekly reports
weeklyReports.description: Get a weekly report of all your incidents, with a summary of what happened, and what was fixed

vacation.title: Someone going on vacation?
vacation.description: Let your team members turn off their notifications, and escalate automatically to the next person in charge

ai.title: AI
ai.description: We use AI to help you understand your incidents, and to help you fix them.

detection.title: Similar incidents detection
detection.description: We can organize similar incidents together

fixes.title: Suggested fixes
fixes.description: We can suggest fixes for an incident, based on what worked before for similar incidents

postMortems.title: Automatically-generated post-mortems
postMortems.description: We can summarize an incident, and provide a quick overview of what happened, and what was fixed. We can send you that post-mortem by e-mail and let you use natural language to search in previous post-mortems.

form.emailDescription: We won't share your e-mail with anyone
form.passwordDescription: We recommend using a strong, random password
form.organizationDescription: After you sign up, you will be able to invite other members of your organization to collaborate. The name of your organization will show on e-mails and invoices.
form.organizationRename: Don't worry, you will be able to rename your organization later

success.title: Thank you for registering!
success.message: You may now go to your personal dashboard to create your first monitors

conflict.title: A user already exists with this e-mail address
conflict.message: It seems you already have a user account. You may use this account to access your dashboard.

error.message: Something went wrong and we were not able to create your account. Please try again.

intro.title: Start monitoring your website today
